services.headline: Packages & Pricing
services.subheadline: Every package includes a planning consultation, professional editing, and an online gallery. Custom packages available for larger events.

items.title: Essential — $2,400
items.description: Perfect for elopements and intimate ceremonies. Includes 6 hours of coverage, one photographer, 300+ edited images delivered in a private online gallery, and a pre-wedding consultation.

items.title: Signature — $3,800
items.description: Our most popular package for full-day weddings. Includes 10 hours of coverage, second photographer, engagement session, 500+ edited images, curated slideshow, and a 30-page linen album.

items.title: Luxury — $5,500
items.description: The complete experience for couples who want it all. Includes full-day coverage from getting ready through the send-off, two photographers, engagement session, boudoir session, 700+ images, slideshow, premium album, and 16x20 fine art print.

items.quote: Sara has this incredible ability to make you forget there's a camera in the room. Our wedding photos feel like memories, not poses. We ugly-cried going through the gallery.
I've never felt comfortable in front of a camera, but Sara made the whole session feel like a conversation. My headshots look like me on my best day — exactly what I wanted.
We flew Sara to Maui for our destination wedding and it was the best decision we made. She scouted locations the day before and knew exactly where the light would be.
Our family session with three kids under five could have been chaos, but Sara rolled with every tantrum and got the most genuine smiles out of all of them. Pure magic.
